sentences.english: At last, an advanced technology is put forward to design automotive torque converter.
sentences.chinese: 最后，建立了轿车液力变矩器的现代设计方法。

sentences.english: The utility model is mainly used on an overload protection structure of a hydraulic coupler.
sentences.chinese: 主要用于液力偶合器的过载保护结构上。

sentences.english: The economic feasibility of application of hydraulic turbine in a 1.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了炼油厂中液力透平的应用方案，以1。

sentences.english: The stator resides in the very center of the torque converter.
sentences.chinese: 定子居住在非常中心地带的液力变矩器。

sentences.english: Its leading products hydraulic coupler industry-wide market share of home first.
sentences.chinese: 其主导产品液力耦合器市场占有率居全行业第一。

sentences.english: The key parameter of the auto-car sock absorber is the response speed of the damping force.
sentences.chinese: 汽车液力式减振器的关键参数是其阻尼力的响应速度。

sentences.english: The sealing of the hydraulic head is very reliable due to its hard sealing design.
sentences.chinese: 液力端采用硬密封结构，密封可靠性好。

sentences.english: But variable torque converter provides a good means for solving the problem.
sentences.chinese: 可调液力变矩器为解决这一问题提供了良好的途径。

sentences.english: RUGGEDNESS . Hydrostatic transmission, dual hydraulic wheel motors.
sentences.chinese: 液力式传动，双液压马达。

sentences.english: Reciprocating plunger seals have been substitute by mechanically or hydraulically actuated diaphragms in diaphragm pumps.
sentences.chinese: 往复活塞密封被机械密封和液力隔膜泵所替代。

sentences.english: Hydro-mechanical transmission assembly is a key part on a wheel loader.
sentences.chinese: 液力机械传动变速器总成是轮式装载机上的关键部件。

sentences.english: The hydraulic transmission has also been successfully applied in modern DMUs.
sentences.chinese: 液力传动在现代化的内燃动车上也得到了成功应用。

sentences.english: Ball grinding machine, AC drive, hydraulic coupler, energy-saving mode.
sentences.chinese: 球磨机，变频器，液力偶合器，节能运行模式。

sentences.english: It shall be equipped with self-lubricating or forced lubricating hydraulic sliding bearing in the motor.
sentences.chinese: 电动机应配备自润滑或强制润滑的液力滑动轴承。

sentences.english: At present, Both imported and domestic slag-pot lorries adopt hydraulic-mechanical drive.
sentences.chinese: 目前，引进和国产的渣罐车均采用液力机械传动方式。

sentences.english: The torque converter includes a stator having a plurality of stator blades.
sentences.chinese: 该液力变矩器包括具有多个导轮叶片的导轮。
